pageTitle: Rep. Peter DeFazio: Campaign Finance/Money - Other Data - Representative 2010 | OpenSecrets
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {912=Peter DeFazio sponsored or co-sponsored 19 earmarks totaling $23,868,900 in fiscal year 2010, ranking 177th out of 435 representatives. See details. To learn more about earmarks, visit our Earmarks section.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {875=Based on data released by the FEC on February 04, 2013.}

textAfterTable: IE is Independent Expenditures, CC is Communication Cost and EC is Electioneering Communications. Coordinated Expenditures are not included.
